import React from 'react' const Coin = ({ name, image, symbol, price, market_cap, priceChange }) => { return (

{name}

{symbol.toUpperCase()}

SGD {price}

SGD {market_cap.toLocaleString()}

{priceChange < 0 ? (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

) : (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

//! apply color change in css )}
) } export default Coin
